### converting hex to little endian array


buf = "15ed312c5863d1e3ff253e8c9077c460233f62bc73d69c5364e0f2de0f7cd064"
it = iter(buf)
r_u8 = [int(x+next(it), 16) for x in it]
r_u8.reverse()
>>> r_u8
[100, 208, 124, 15, 222, 242, 224, 100, 83, 156, 214, 115, 188, 98, 63, 35, 96, 196, 119, 144, 140, 62, 37, 255, 227, 209, 99, 88, 44, 49, 237, 21]



buf = "8725a400582dd3ba7da7722981222e18df4d2af8937c8be4ee4354ac1977a23c"
it = iter(buf)
r_u8_y = [int(x+next(it), 16) for x in it]
r_u8_y.reverse()
